title: Why are the graphics in TFT worse than in LoL?
body:
The units have very nice outlines and rendering effects in League of Legends, but in Team Fight Tactics everything looks... bland.

They're both running on the same engine, they're even on the same client, why is the graphics lower?

replies.body:
Because it was a rushed mode they have not had time to polish up yet?

Pretty obvious they wanted it to be playable and stable, and see if it proved popular, before making fancy graphics.

But that's why I think it's weird because, the fancy graphics are already there since it's the same client.

I guess it might not be that simple though... :D
The client has nothing to do with the graphics quality.

a LOT more has to be loaded
Imagine having 8 full teams in one game on hexakill
it's worse than that.
